<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the edge to the adjacency sets of its nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Construct an empty PBQP graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Construct an empty PBQP graph with the given graph metadata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac1b8aade7a27183542a1dc10a34d28ef"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac1b8aade7a27183542a1dc10a34d28ef">Graph</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b4311ed4a57ef1150d10b23d683e439">GraphMetadata</a> Metadata) : Metadata(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(Metadata)) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get a reference to the graph metadata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aed0054f4566fed7f8dbb7090b58d5e38"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b4311ed4a57ef1150d10b23d683e439">GraphMetadata</a>&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aed0054f4566fed7f8dbb7090b58d5e38">getMetadata</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Metadata; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get a const-reference to the graph metadata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b5d794cba9a4308aad0f5970412b500"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b4311ed4a57ef1150d10b23d683e439">GraphMetadata</a>&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b5d794cba9a4308aad0f5970412b500">getMetadata</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Metadata; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Lock this graph to the given solver instance in preparation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// for running the solver. This method will call solver.handleAddNode for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// each node in the graph, and handleAddEdge for each edge, to give the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// solver an opportunity to set up any requried metadata.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a89f92ffd256a37d37726145b00d09b77"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a89f92ffd256a37d37726145b00d09b77">setSolver</a>(SolverT &amp;S) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Solver &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Solver already set. Call unsetSolver().&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">      Solver = &amp;S;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NId : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a84ff7ee5d27c3a8173490fb89d7a7379">nodeIds</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleAddNode(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EId : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#afb740fccb3ee61c6176f946bb22e9b1a">edgeIds</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleAddEdge(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Release from solver instance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0277999b64eeab12e9dcb9bc6d965b4c"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0277999b64eeab12e9dcb9bc6d965b4c">unsetSolver</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Solver &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Solver not set.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      Solver = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Add a node with the given costs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @param Costs Cost vector for the new node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @return Node iterator for the added node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OtherVectorT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae7ac2dc045a204de18d1b15863dd037b"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae7ac2dc045a204de18d1b15863dd037b">addNode</a>(OtherVectorT Costs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get cost vector from the problem domain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#af286e5a878c03492516f4e8431e891a0">VectorPtr</a> AllocatedCosts = CostAlloc.getVector(std::move(Costs));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId = addConstructedNode(NodeEntry(AllocatedCosts));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Solver)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleAddNode(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NId;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Add a node bypassing the cost allocator.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @param Costs Cost vector ptr for the new node (must be convertible to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///        VectorPtr).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @return Node iterator for the added node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   This method allows for fast addition of a node whose costs don&#39;t need</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// to be passed through the cost allocator. The most common use case for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// this is when duplicating costs from an existing node (when using a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// pooling allocator). These have already been uniqued, so we can avoid</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// re-constructing and re-uniquing them by attaching them directly to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// new node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OtherVectorPtrT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a805fead02ff04e6e3a0d954f69e2715d"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a805fead02ff04e6e3a0d954f69e2715d">addNodeBypassingCostAllocator</a>(OtherVectorPtrT Costs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId = addConstructedNode(NodeEntry(Costs));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Solver)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleAddNode(NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NId;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Add an edge between the given nodes with the given costs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @param N1Id First node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @param N2Id Second node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @param Costs Cost matrix for new edge.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @return Edge iterator for the added edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OtherVectorT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#abc9cbae0487a2766aa1b4c9050c906b8">AdjEdgeItr</a> AEItr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.adjEdgesBegin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Disconnect an edge from the given node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Removes the given edge from the adjacency list of the given node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This operation leaves the edge in an &#39;asymmetric&#39; state: It will no</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// longer appear in an iteration over the given node&#39;s (NId&#39;s) edges, but</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// will appear in an iteration over the &#39;other&#39;, unnamed node&#39;s edges.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This does not correspond to any normal graph operation, but exists to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// support efficient PBQP graph-reduction based solvers. It is used to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// &#39;effectively&#39; remove the unnamed node from the graph while the solver</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// is performing the reduction. The solver will later call reconnectNode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// to restore the edge in the named node&#39;s adjacency list.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Since the degree of a node is the number of connected edges,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// disconnecting an edge from a node &#39;u&#39; will cause the degree of &#39;u&#39; to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// drop by 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// A disconnected edge WILL still appear in an iteration over the graph</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// edges.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// A disconnected edge should not be removed from the graph, it should be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// reconnected first.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// A disconnected edge can be reconnected by calling the reconnectEdge</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// method.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0fc861a44ceb8e7b9ad83ff1376990b8"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0fc861a44ceb8e7b9ad83ff1376990b8">disconnectEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Solver)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleDisconnectEdge(EId, NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = getEdge(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.disconnectFrom(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Convenience method to disconnect all neighbours from the given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///        node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac3a81ba1d3a9b9fd110dd0f5114b5189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac3a81ba1d3a9b9fd110dd0f5114b5189">disconnectAllNeighborsFromNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AEId : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a4936340a88a6f1856e6edab7357d1270">adjEdgeIds</a>(NId))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0fc861a44ceb8e7b9ad83ff1376990b8">disconnectEdge</a>(AEId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a3fc350aed201496737e62751a8ad95f4">getEdgeOtherNodeId</a>(AEId, NId));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Re-attach an edge to its nodes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Adds an edge that had been previously disconnected back into the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// adjacency set of the nodes that the edge connects.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac7c7346dbc788cb3913012430e538011"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac7c7346dbc788cb3913012430e538011">reconnectEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = getEdge(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.connectTo(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, EId, NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Solver)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleReconnectEdge(EId, NId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Remove an edge from the graph.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// @param EId Edge id.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae588c35f459a7e4925b870ece5849a8b"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae588c35f459a7e4925b870ece5849a8b">removeEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Solver)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">        Solver-&gt;handleRemoveEdge(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = getEdge(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.disconnect();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeEdgeIds.push&#95;back(EId);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">      Edges&#91;EId&#93;.invalidate();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Remove all nodes and edges from the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aa23dfa6d17e0a66e9d2ceffc5e57812d"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aa23dfa6d17e0a66e9d2ceffc5e57812d">clear</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">      Nodes.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeNodeIds.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">      Edges.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">      FreeEdgeIds.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
